features: SCIATICA AND BACK PAIN RELIEF: Provides excellent comfort, support, relieves pressure on the tailbone, coccyx, and promotes proper posture. Eliminating this pressure can help with sciatica relief, tailbone injuries, back pain, hip pain, and hemorrhoids.

TAKE-ANYWHERE COMFORT: Instant comfort on any surface, office chairs, kitchen chairs, wheelchairs and in your car or truck, or at the stadium. Great for at home, on an office chair, a wheelchair, or during travel by car or plane.

ERGONOMIC DESIGN: Center groove design for relieving pressure on the low back. Soft gel and high density foam alleviate pressure points and disperses body weight. Gel never permanent deform even after prolonged sitting and always regain its shape. Non skid bottom keeps cushion in place. Low shear neoprene cover material is breathable.
GREAT AIR CIRCULATION: Breathing and cooling vents offer great air circulation while sitting for long-hours.

PORTABLE AND EASY TO CLEAN: Foldable design for easy carrying with the handle. Water resistant cover is easy to clean by damp cloth. The durable foam and gel construction provides support and pressure relief that lasts for years. DIMENSION: 17.7"x15.7"x1.5"
body.description: This Item Includes One (1) Foldable Gel Seat Cushion with Handle. Product Description: This orthopedic cool gel seat cushion is a pressure-reducing seat for car, office chair, and home chair etc. Pressure relieving soft gel is layered over high density foam effectively redistributing body pressure and providing relief throughout back and coccyx areas. It instantly transforms into a perfect comfortable seat so that you can rest and relax. This orthopedic chair pad provides excellent back support and relieves common symptoms that stem from body weight pressing down on the lower tailbone area. Eliminating this pressure can help with sciatica relief, tailbone injuries, back pain, hip pain, and hemorrhoids.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort on the go
reviews.reviewText: This is the fourth time I have purchased this product. With its attached handle it has been easy to transport when we travel in the car or on an airplane. We take it to sit in our beach chairs and the bleachers at our grand children’s games, as well as in restaurants when the seating is not user-friendly. I have recommended it to several friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easily portable but loses its thickness after 2 months
reviews.reviewText: This cushion is really comfortable to sit on and easily portable. I docked it one star because after about 2 months of daily use, it lost it’s thickness and wasn’t as squishy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2020
reviews.reviewText: In my line of work I can spend A LOT of time sitting around, often in uncomfortable folding chairs. This cushion has made long days so much better. Not only is it comfortable, it keeps me from getting cold when sitting on metal chairs in the winter. The fact that it folds and has a carrying handle just ups the stars for me! I often move to multiple locations in one day and it’s so easy to clip it to my bag when traveling between locations. One less thing to carry! Yay! I’m kind of glad someone stole my last cushion. They did me a favor as this one is a huge upgrade.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Reading the product description gave me hope,as did some of the reviews; the experience left me flat,literally.First, realize that back pain is highly subjective and what may act as a remedy for one person will not necessarily do so for another.Also,this is a cushion not a cure.Keep these things in mind, as your experience and situation may differ from mine.Nevertheless,the description of relief from the pain of sitting caused by spinal issues led me to purchase this product.For the record,I am 6'0", 190 lbs- fairly average for an adult.I was,therefore,excited to unbox and try it out - the cushion seems well made,has convenient carry handles and is of reasonable size and weight.This was all quite encouraging so I placed it upon a flat chair,laid the corner of a sheet over it for cleanliness and sat down ...the material it is made of compressed to less than half its original volume and,in the several minutes I remained seated,actually began to cause me pain.I was dismayed.To be sure,I asked my wife,who has a healthy spine, to have a seat; she mentioned being made uncomfortable almost immediately.I was flummoxed.This is my first try with a memory foam/gel cushion; frankly,I suspect that it may simply be a poor choice of material for this application.If it compresses to the extent of causing discomfort,what is the point of even having it ?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Have a bad back and been stuck on an airplane? You want this!
reviews.reviewText: So I have a bad back. Acts up sometimes. Scary if I am traveling, and a coach airline seat can be daunting. This is a nice thing to have. It folds in half as designed and fits nicely into my backpack (biggest pocket). I pull it out when and if I need it. It fits nicely on the plane seat, and I just plop myself right on top of it. It would be nice if it was a bit deeper in dimension, to cover more of the seat, but I can work around it. It is memory foamy, and does not get hot. I still need to get up and walk around the cabin to stretch some now and again - it is not a magic cushion. But sure is nice to have this handy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very portable, very comfortable.
reviews.reviewText: Tried several cushions for painful bursitis in one of my two seat bones. Others were not consistent, or continuously comfortable, too thick (3"), or too heavy to be easily portable. This one is very thin and lightweight, folds nicely for transport, and fits great in the living room chair, office chair, and car seat. I turned the cushion around to have the side with the breathing holes to be under the seat bones. MUCH more comfortable. I can see using it to go to stadium games. I recommend you give it a try. I actually bought this cushion, and am not getting any benefit from this review. Hope it works for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Could be better!
reviews.reviewText: I dislike the fabric, not as cool as mentioned in the description. Goes flat after using it after a few months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars great product for travelers with back issues
reviews.reviewText: I travel a lot, and often for long distances. I also suffer from lower back pain. I have tried many seat cushion products over the years in an attempt to ease my discomfort in sitting for long periods. this device is clever and effective. It is angled so as to give maximum support to the rear, tapering to the front. It has cooling gel so it does not heat up. It has a groove down the middle as often recommended by doctors. It has built in handles and folds in half so is easy to carry, as well as place on a seat. It has a plastic bottom so it can be used on stadium seats, bleachers, office chairs, or airline seats. This is an effective product at a rather reasonable price.

I hurt my coccyx a year ago and I was in so much pain (especially seating). I have tried other cushions but they didn't give me relief. This cushion is the best, it provides support and comfort, I have used it for air travel (14 hours) + I use it for work every day!
It is very comfortable, but beware that it is a bit heavy and bulky of carrying while flying.
What can I say. I am sitting on one right now at my sewing/computer station. When I go to the loung room I'll be sitting on another of these on my lounge chair. LIKE.
I love this! It allows me to sit comfortably for 5-6 hour flight. I use it at home on my favorite chair. I enjoy being able to fold it up at boarding and disembarking.
